LanguageData.CardCounter25.baseDesc: In the urbworld underlevels, the strong kids learn to fight, the smart kids learn to cheat, and the other kids die. [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the smart kids.
LanguageData.CardCounter25.title: card counter
LanguageData.StreetUrchin22.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by two drug-addicted gamblers who didn't provide a decent standard of living. [PAWN_nameDef] learned to survive by pursuing dangerous and often poorly-planned schemes and swindles that sometimes resulted in food.
LanguageData.StreetUrchin22.title: street urchin
